amendment.description: Amendment prohibits expenditures to any contractor subject to the requirement in section 4212(d) of title 38, United States Code, that has not submitted an annual report to the Secretary of Labor concerning the employment of veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in the bill to be used to enter into any contracts with any business that has not complied with reporting requirements regarding non-discrimanattion in employment of disabled Veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
